title: ConnectiCoin
author: ConnectiCoin
content: Hello ALLWe are looking to experiment with op_return transactions on CTC. If you want to come experiment with us please join our discord, install a wallet and get some coin to play with!Thanks hope to see you soon!https://discord.gg/npNfUr3pEy

comments.author: NFTmetria
comments.body: It would be great if you could describe your proposal in more detail.
